flawed_nl_solution:
The land will be divided into 1 (Jose) + 4 siblings = <<1+4=1>>1 pieces.
So, Jose will have 20000/1 = <<20000/1=20000>>20000 square meters of land.
#### 20000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 1. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
